note: The values for dataset size are estimates and come with some uncertainty, especially for models for which only minimal information has been disclosed, such as GPT-4.
title: Artificial intelligence: Performance on knowledge tests vs. dataset size
subtitle: Performance on knowledge tests is measured with the [MMLU benchmark](#dod:ai-MMLU), here with 5-shot learning, which gauges a modelâ€™s accuracy after receiving only five examples for each task. Training dataset size refers to the volume of text that is employed to train a model effectively.
